mapper.select: SELECT s.userId,s.mobilePhone,t.storeName,t.userName,t.phone,s.locked,t.licenseId FROM sys_user s LEFT JOIN t_store t ON s.userId=t.userId WHERE t.storeId=#{storeId}

SELECT s.storeName,s.userName,s.idCard,s.phone,s.area,s.address,s.licenseId, s.frontPic,s.backPic,s.licensePic,s.frontStorePic,s.innerStorePic, b.bankType,b.accountType,b.userName bankUserName,b.cardNumber, b.idType,b.idCard cIdCard,b.remark FROM t_store s LEFT JOIN t_bankCard b ON s.userId=b.userId WHERE s.storeId=#{storeId}
